content.text:
# 2015 MTV Video Music Awards Japan

| network          = MTV Japan
| previous         = 2014
| main             =
| next             = 2016
}}
The 2015 MTV Video Music Awards Japan was held in Tokyo on November 26, 2015 and was hosted by Verbal from m-flo.
Presenters
* Little Mix – presented Dempagumi.inc with their MTV EMA Best Japanese Act}} award
* Kazuto Koya – presented the Contribution to Entertainment Award
Winners and nominees
Winners are highlighted in bold.
{| class="wikitable" style="width:100%;"
|-

|-
| valign="top" |
* Sandaime J Soul Brothers — "Eeny, meeny, miny, moe!"
** Namie Amuro — "Birthday"
** Ariana Grande (featuring Iggy Azalea) — "Problem"
** Doberman Infinity — "Infinity"
** Gen Hoshino — "Sun"

** OK Go — "I Won't Let You Down"

** Years & Years — "King"
| valign="top" |
* Gen Hoshino — "SUN"
** AK-69 – "The Throne"
** AKLO (featuring Salu, H.Teflon, and K Dub Shine) – "RGTO"
** Ken Hirai – "Soredemo Shitai"
